name: MeTwo
description:
This is my entry for the Jammin2021 game jam, who's theme is "reflection". You're a clumsy wizard who's lost their soul gems across different dimensions. Use your reflection powers to capture them!

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys/ WASD

Credits

Gameplay - Marcus Sanatan

Sound - https://homestudio.genius.com/ (R&B track)

Graphics - Kenny.nl for Tileset (Roguelike Pixel)
